TEXT.S: Kosovo hya' ga cyux maki' tay 42 35 N, 21 00 E na Oco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 10,887 sq km (maki' tay 169ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 10,887 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 0 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 1,883,018. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 52.80 , lhlahuy hya' ga 41.70 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 5.50 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Pristina. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 17 na tay sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Hashim Tha√ßi, aring ryax 7 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2016 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
